title: Color Palette Generator
description: Interactive tool to generate harmonious color palettes based on color theory principles.
content:
# Color Palette Generator

Create beautiful, harmonious color palettes for your design projects. This interactive tool uses color theory principles to generate complementary, analogous, triadic, and other color schemes.

## How to Use

1. **Start with a base color**: Click on the color picker or enter a hex value
2. **Choose harmony type**: Select from complementary, analogous, triadic, or split-complementary
3. **Adjust parameters**: Fine-tune saturation, brightness, and hue
4. **Export your palette**: Download as CSS, JSON, or Adobe Swatch file

## Features

- Real-time color preview
- Multiple harmony algorithms
- Accessibility compliance checking
- Export in various formats
- Save and load palettes
- Color blindness simulation

seo.title: Color Palette Generator - Free Online Design Tool
seo.description: Generate beautiful color palettes with this free online tool. Perfect for web design, branding, and digital art projects.

title: Text Counter & Analyzer
description: Comprehensive text analysis tool for character count, word count, reading time, and SEO optimization.
content:
# Text Counter & Analyzer

Comprehensive text analysis tool for writers, bloggers, and content creators. Get detailed statistics about your text including character count, word count, reading time, and SEO insights.

## Analysis Features

### Basic Counting
- **Characters**: Total characters with and without spaces
- **Words**: Word count with smart detection
- **Sentences**: Sentence count and average length
- **Paragraphs**: Paragraph count and structure analysis

### Reading Metrics
- **Reading Time**: Estimated reading time for average readers
- **Speaking Time**: Time needed to speak the text aloud
- **Complexity Score**: Text complexity analysis
- **Grade Level**: Reading level assessment

### SEO Analysis
- **Keyword Density**: Most frequent words and phrases
- **Title Suggestions**: SEO-optimized title recommendations
- **Meta Description**: Character count for meta descriptions
- **Social Media**: Character limits for various platforms

### Language Features
- **Multiple Languages**: Support for various languages
- **Encoding Detection**: Automatic character encoding detection
- **Unicode Support**: Full Unicode character support
- **Export Options**: Save analysis as CSV or PDF

## Perfect For

- Content writers and bloggers
- SEO professionals
- Students and academics
- Social media managers
- Email marketers

seo.title: Text Counter & Analyzer - Free Writing Tool
seo.description: Comprehensive text analysis tool with character count, word count, reading time, and SEO optimization features.

title: Pomodoro Timer
description: Productivity timer based on the Pomodoro Technique with customizable intervals and task tracking.
content:
# Pomodoro Timer

Boost your productivity with this customizable Pomodoro Timer. Based on the proven Pomodoro Technique, this tool helps you focus on tasks in manageable intervals.

## How It Works

The Pomodoro Technique breaks work into focused 25-minute intervals followed by short breaks:

1. **Work Period**: Focus on a single task for 25 minutes
2. **Short Break**: Take a 5-minute break
3. **Repeat**: Complete 4 work periods
4. **Long Break**: Take a 15-30 minute break

## Features

### Customizable Settings
- **Work Duration**: Adjust work period length (15-60 minutes)
- **Break Duration**: Customize short and long break times
- **Session Count**: Set number of sessions before long break
- **Auto-start**: Automatically start next period

### Task Management
- **Task List**: Add and manage your tasks
- **Task Timer**: Track time spent on each task
- **Progress Tracking**: Monitor completed pomodoros per task
- **Estimated Pomodoros**: Plan how many sessions each task needs

### Statistics & Insights
- **Daily Stats**: Track daily productivity metrics
- **Weekly Reports**: View weekly productivity trends
- **Task Analytics**: Analyze time spent on different tasks
- **Focus Score**: Measure your focus consistency

### Notifications & Alerts
- **Sound Alerts**: Customizable notification sounds
- **Visual Cues**: Screen flash and color changes
- **Browser Notifications**: Desktop notifications
- **Motivational Messages**: Encouraging messages between sessions

## Benefits

- Improved focus and concentration
- Better time management
- Reduced procrastination
- Enhanced productivity
- Stress reduction through regular breaks

seo.title: Pomodoro Timer - Free Productivity Tool
seo.description: Boost productivity with this customizable Pomodoro Timer. Task tracking, statistics, and notifications included.

title: AE Expression Helper
description: After Effects expression generator and reference tool with common expressions, custom property controls, and animation presets.
content:
# AE Expression Helper

Streamline your After Effects workflow with this comprehensive expression library and generator. Perfect for motion graphics artists and animators.

## Expression Categories

### Transform Animations
- **Position**: Bounce, swing, follow path animations
- **Rotation**: Continuous rotation, oscillation, spring physics
- **Scale**: Elastic scaling, breathing effects, random variations
- **Opacity**: Fade in/out, flickering, pulse effects

### Text Animations
- **Typewriter Effect**: Character-by-character reveal
- **Text Tracking**: Dynamic letter spacing
- **Text Scramble**: Random character replacement
- **Source Text Animation**: Animated text content changes

### Advanced Controls
- **Camera Controls**: Auto-focus, shake, orbit animations
- **Shape Layers**: Dynamic path creation and morphing
- **Time Controls**: Speed ramping, time remapping
- **Random Functions**: Noise-based animations, random selection

## Features

### Code Generator
- **Interactive Builder**: Visual interface for expression creation
- **Parameter Controls**: Slider controls for easy adjustment
- **Copy-Paste Ready**: One-click copying to clipboard
- **Syntax Highlighting**: Color-coded expression syntax

### Learning Resources
- **Expression Breakdown**: Detailed explanations of each line
- **Video Tutorials**: Embedded tutorial videos
- **Best Practices**: Performance optimization tips
- **Troubleshooting**: Common error solutions

## Perfect For

- Motion graphics artists
- Video editors
- Animation students
- Creative professionals
- After Effects beginners learning expressions

seo.title: AE Expression Helper - After Effects Animation Tool
seo.description: Comprehensive After Effects expression library and generator. Create complex animations with ready-to-use expressions.

title: Sequential PNG Preview
description: Preview and analyze PNG sequences with frame-by-frame navigation, timing controls, and export options for animation workflows.
content:
# Sequential PNG Preview

Analyze and preview PNG image sequences for animation and VFX work. Essential tool for animators, VFX artists, and game developers.

## Core Features

### Sequence Loading
- **Drag & Drop**: Easy sequence loading interface
- **Batch Upload**: Load multiple sequences simultaneously
- **Auto-Detection**: Automatic frame order detection
- **File Validation**: PNG format and resolution checking

### Playback Controls
- **Frame Navigation**: Step through frames manually
- **Playback Speed**: Adjustable FPS from 1-60
- **Loop Options**: Loop, bounce, or single playthrough
- **Scrub Timeline**: Scrub through frames with precision

### Analysis Tools
- **Frame Information**: Resolution, file size, color depth
- **Sequence Stats**: Total frames, duration, file sizes
- **Quality Assessment**: Compression analysis and artifacts detection
- **Comparison Mode**: Side-by-side frame comparison

## Export Options

### Video Formats
- **MP4**: High-quality video export
- **WebM**: Web-optimized format
- **GIF**: Animated GIF creation
- **MOV**: Professional video format

### Image Formats
- **Contact Sheet**: Grid layout of all frames
- **Individual Frames**: Export specific frames
- **Optimized PNG**: Compressed PNG sequences
- **Sprite Sheet**: Game development sprite sheets

## Professional Applications

### Animation Workflows
- **Preview Renders**: Quick animation preview
- **Client Reviews**: Share animation progress
- **Quality Control**: Frame-by-frame inspection
- **Timing Adjustments**: Test different frame rates

### VFX and Compositing
- **Render Verification**: Check render sequences
- **Element Integration**: Preview compositing elements
- **Color Consistency**: Analyze color across frames
- **Motion Analysis**: Study movement patterns

### Game Development
- **Sprite Animation**: Preview character animations
- **UI Animation**: Test interface animations
- **Effect Sequences**: Particle and effect previews
- **Asset Validation**: Ensure proper animation loops

## Technical Specifications

- Supports PNG sequences up to 4K resolution
- Maximum 1000 frames per sequence
- Batch processing up to 10 sequences
- Real-time playback up to 60 FPS
- Export formats: MP4, WebM, GIF, MOV

seo.title: Sequential PNG Preview - Animation Sequence Analyzer
seo.description: Preview and analyze PNG image sequences for animation workflows. Frame navigation, timing controls, and export options.

title: SVG to TSX Converter
description: Convert SVG files to TypeScript React components with customizable props, styling options, and optimization features.
content:
# SVG to TSX Converter

Transform SVG icons and graphics into reusable React TypeScript components. Essential tool for React developers and design systems.

## Conversion Features

### Input Options
- **Single SVG**: Convert individual SVG files
- **Batch Processing**: Convert multiple SVGs simultaneously
- **Direct Paste**: Paste SVG code directly
- **URL Import**: Import SVGs from URLs

### Component Generation
- **TypeScript Components**: Full TypeScript support with proper typing
- **Customizable Props**: Size, color, className, and custom props
- **Component Names**: Auto-generated or custom component names
- **Export Formats**: Named exports, default exports, or both

### Optimization
- **SVG Optimization**: Remove unnecessary attributes and whitespace
- **Path Simplification**: Optimize SVG paths for smaller file sizes
- **Accessibility**: Add proper ARIA labels and roles
- **Performance**: Optimize for React rendering performance

## Output Customization

### Component Structure
- **Functional Components**: Modern React functional component syntax
- **Props Interface**: TypeScript interfaces for component props
- **Default Props**: Configurable default values
- **Forward Ref**: Ref forwarding support for DOM access

### Styling Options
- **CSS-in-JS**: Styled-components or emotion integration
- **CSS Modules**: CSS module class support
- **Inline Styles**: React inline style objects
- **Tailwind CSS**: Tailwind class integration

### Advanced Features
- **Size Props**: Dynamic width and height props
- **Color Props**: Dynamic fill and stroke color props
- **Theme Integration**: Support for theme-based styling
- **Icon Libraries**: Generate complete icon library exports

## Development Workflow

### Design System Integration
- **Consistent Naming**: Standardized component naming conventions
- **Type Safety**: Full TypeScript integration
- **Documentation**: Auto-generated prop documentation
- **Storybook**: Optional Storybook stories generation

### Code Quality
- **ESLint Ready**: Generated code follows ESLint rules
- **Prettier Formatted**: Properly formatted output code
- **Tree Shaking**: Optimized for tree shaking
- **Bundle Size**: Minimal impact on bundle size

## Export Formats

### Individual Components
```tsx
// IconName.tsx
export interface IconNameProps {
  size?: number;
  color?: string;
  className?: string;
}

export const IconName: React.FC<IconNameProps> = ({ size = 24, color = 'currentColor', className }) => {
  // SVG component code
};
```

### Icon Library
```tsx
// icons/index.ts
export { IconName } from './IconName';
export { AnotherIcon } from './AnotherIcon';

// Complete icon library export
export * as Icons from './icons';
```

## Use Cases

- React component libraries
- Design system development
- Icon library creation
- SVG asset optimization
- TypeScript migration projects

seo.title: SVG to TSX Converter - React TypeScript Component Generator
seo.description: Convert SVG files to TypeScript React components with optimization and customization options. Perfect for design systems.

title: Pi Memory Game
description: Challenge your memory by reciting digits of Pi with progressive difficulty levels, achievements, and educational information about the mathematical constant.
content:
# Pi Memory Game

Test and improve your memory with the infinite digits of Pi. Educational and entertaining game for mathematics enthusiasts and memory training.

## Game Modes

### Classic Mode
- **Progressive Challenge**: Start with 3.14 and keep going
- **Time Pressure**: Optional time limits for added challenge
- **Mistake Tolerance**: Choose between strict or forgiving modes
- **Hint System**: Get hints when you're stuck

### Learning Mode
- **Guided Practice**: Step-by-step digit learning
- **Memory Techniques**: Learn mnemonics and memory aids
- **Chunk Training**: Practice with digit groups
- **Pattern Recognition**: Identify patterns in Pi's digits

### Challenge Modes
- **Speed Round**: How fast can you recite 100 digits?
- **Endurance Test**: How far can you go without mistakes?
- **Daily Challenge**: New daily targets and goals
- **Competition Mode**: Multiplayer challenges

## Educational Features

### Pi Facts and History
- **Mathematical Significance**: Why Pi is important
- **Historical Timeline**: Pi discoveries through history
- **Calculation Methods**: How Pi has been calculated
- **Real-world Applications**: Where Pi appears in nature and science

### Memory Training
- **Mnemonic Techniques**: Word and phrase memory aids
- **Visualization**: Visual memory techniques
- **Chunking Strategies**: Group digits for easier memorization
- **Practice Schedules**: Optimal learning and review timing

### Progress Tracking

- **Learning Analytics**: Analyze your memorization patterns
- **Difficulty Progression**: Gradually increase challenge level

## Features

### Game Mechanics
- **Digit Input**: Type or click digit interface
- **Visual Feedback**: Immediate right/wrong feedback
- **Error Analysis**: Learn from mistakes with explanations

### Customization
- **Difficulty Settings**: Adjust challenge level
- **Interface Themes**: Choose from multiple visual themes

- **Input Methods**: Keyboard, mouse, or touch input

### Social Features
- **Leaderboards**: Global and friend rankings
- **Share Achievements**: Social media integration
- **Challenge Friends**: Send challenges to friends
- **Community**: Join the Pi memorization community

## Educational Value

### Mathematics Learning
- **Number Theory**: Understanding irrational numbers
- **Geometry Connections**: Pi's role in circles and spheres
- **Calculus Applications**: Pi in advanced mathematics
- **Mathematical Beauty**: Appreciate mathematical elegance

### Memory Skills
- **Working Memory**: Improve short-term memory capacity
- **Long-term Retention**: Build lasting memory skills
- **Concentration**: Enhance focus and attention span
- **Mental Agility**: Develop quick recall abilities

## Achievements System

- **First Steps**: Recite first 10 digits

- **Pi Enthusiast**: Achieve 200 digits
- **Memory Master**: Recite 500+ digits
- **Pi Legend**: Join the 1000+ digits club

title: Commission Price Calculator
description: Calculate project pricing for freelance work with customizable rates, project complexity factors, and client management features.
content:
# Commission Price Calculator

Calculate fair and profitable pricing for your creative projects. Essential tool for freelancers, agencies, and creative professionals.

## Pricing Models

### Hourly Rate Calculation
- **Base Hourly Rate**: Set your standard hourly rate
- **Time Estimation**: Project duration estimation tools
- **Complexity Multipliers**: Adjust rates based on project difficulty
- **Rush Job Premiums**: Additional charges for urgent projects

### Fixed Price Projects
- **Scope-based Pricing**: Price based on project deliverables
- **Value-based Pricing**: Price based on client value received
- **Package Pricing**: Pre-defined service packages
- **Milestone Payments**: Break projects into payment phases

### Hybrid Models
- **Retainer + Hourly**: Combine retainer with hourly billing
- **Cap and Collar**: Set minimum and maximum project costs
- **Performance Bonuses**: Success-based pricing additions
- **Equity Arrangements**: Partial equity compensation

## Cost Factors

### Direct Costs
- **Labor Hours**: Your time and team time
- **Software Licenses**: Required software and tools
- **Stock Assets**: Photos, fonts, music, graphics
- **Third-party Services**: Contractors, specialists, vendors

### Indirect Costs
- **Business Overhead**: Office, utilities, insurance
- **Marketing Costs**: Client acquisition expenses
- **Administrative Time**: Project management, communication
- **Professional Development**: Skills training and education

### Risk Factors
- **Client Risk Assessment**: Payment history, project clarity
- **Project Complexity**: Technical difficulty, creative challenge
- **Timeline Constraints**: Tight deadlines, dependency risks
- **Scope Creep Potential**: Likelihood of additional work

## Features

### Project Templates
- **Web Design**: Website design and development projects
- **Logo Design**: Brand identity and logo creation
- **Video Production**: Video editing and motion graphics
- **Marketing Materials**: Brochures, flyers, advertising
- **Custom Templates**: Create your own project types

### Quote Generation
- **Professional Proposals**: Branded PDF proposals
- **Itemized Quotes**: Detailed cost breakdowns
- **Terms and Conditions**: Standard contract terms
- **Multiple Options**: Present different pricing tiers

### Client Management
- **Client Database**: Store client information and history
- **Project History**: Track past projects and rates
- **Payment Terms**: Flexible payment schedule options
- **Follow-up Reminders**: Automatic quote follow-ups

## Advanced Features

### Profitability Analysis
- **Margin Calculation**: Ensure healthy profit margins
- **Breakeven Analysis**: Minimum pricing requirements
- **ROI Tracking**: Return on investment analysis
- **Competitive Benchmarking**: Compare with market rates

### Reporting and Analytics
- **Revenue Tracking**: Monthly and yearly revenue reports
- **Project Performance**: Analyze project profitability
- **Time Tracking Integration**: Connect with time tracking tools
- **Tax Preparation**: Export data for tax purposes

### Collaboration Tools
- **Team Rates**: Different rates for team members
- **Shared Templates**: Team-wide pricing templates
- **Approval Workflows**: Multi-stage quote approval
- **Client Collaboration**: Share quotes and get feedback

## Industry Applications

### Creative Services
- Graphic design and branding
- Web design and development
- Photography and videography
- Content creation and copywriting

### Consulting Services
- Business consulting
- Technical consulting
- Marketing strategy
- Training and workshops

### Technical Services
- Software development
- IT support and maintenance
- Data analysis and reporting
- System integration

## Benefits

- Accurate project pricing
- Professional quote presentation
- Improved profit margins
- Streamlined client communication
- Better project tracking
- Data-driven pricing decisions

seo.title: Commission Price Calculator - Freelance Pricing Tool
seo.description: Calculate fair pricing for creative and freelance projects. Multiple pricing models, templates, and quote generation included.
